message: Let's split it evenly to start, and we can reassess later.
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle
You met me in the middle last round, now I'll meet you in the middle again.
You're trying to outmaneuver me, but I'll take control
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better split to make it worth my while.
You're getting desperate, I'll take advantage of it
I'm not desperate, I'm just trying to get a fair deal. I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up.
You're not getting the upper hand, it's time to take control
I'm not going to give up yet. I need a better split to make it worth my while, or I'll walk away.
You're running out of time, I'm taking what I can get
This is my final offer. I'm not going to accept anything less than a 70-30 split. Take it or leave it.
It's now or never, I'll take the last chance to get a decent share
